DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To identify best fast plasma glucose ( FPG ) target Chinese type 2 diabetes patient use insulin glargine provide high control rate glycated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) < 7 % . Secondary Objectives : The control rate HbA1c ≤6.5 % achievement . The control rate HbA1c < 7.0 % patient achieve FPG target . The percentage HbA1c < 7 % without hypoglycemia . The percentage patient achieve FPG target without hypoglycemia . The percentage patient achieve FPG target post prandial glucose ( PPG ) target ( 2-hour post breakfast < 10 mmol/L ) .
